variable.name: hud_frags_style
variable.description: Sets drawing style of 'frags' HUD element.

value.description: Golden brackets around your own frags field.
Arrow pointing to your own frags field.
Red rectangle around your own frags fiels.
Sets background color for your own field to 'teamcolor'.
Sets background color for all field to teamcolors enemycolors, all fields 50% transparent, your own field not transparent. Red rectangle around your own field including name and team tag.
Red rectangle around your own field including name and team tag. Background color only for your own field and set to 'teamcolor'.
Background color for whole table 50% transparent red, your own field not transparent.
Red background color only for your own field including name and team tag.
